mapper.update:
update e_machin_set
dic_mac_type = #{dicMacType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_tea_attr = #{dicTeaAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_mac_pro = #{dicMacPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_tea_type = #{dicTeaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_tea_gra = #{dicTeaGra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
humidity = #{humidity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mac_loss = #{macLoss,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_duration = #{beginDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_duration = #{endDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
duration_type = #{durationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_machin_set set dic_mac_type = #{dicMacType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_tea_attr = #{dicTeaAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_mac_pro = #{dicMacPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_tea_type = #{dicTeaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_tea_gra = #{dicTeaGra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, humidity = #{humidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mac_loss = #{macLoss,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_duration = #{beginDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_duration = #{endDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duration_type = #{durationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.dic_mac_type dicMacType, m.dic_tea_attr dicTeaAttr, m.dic_mac_pro dicMacPro, m.dic_tea_type dicTeaType, m.dic_tea_gra dicTeaGra, m.status, m.temperature, m.humidity, m.mac_loss, m.begin_duration, m.end_duration, m.duration_type, m.create_time, d. name macTypeName, d1. name teaAttrName, d2. name macProName, d3. name teaTypeName, d4. name teaGraName FROM e_machin_set m LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d ON m.dic_mac_type = d.id LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d1 ON m.dic_tea_attr = d1.id LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d2 ON m.dic_mac_pro = d2.id LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d3 ON m.dic_tea_type = d3.id LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d4 ON m.dic_tea_gra = d4.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.id = #{id}
